Comment.val: di SAP create or alter view ItemHistory as select ItemCode, Sum(U_IDU_QtyPack) 'Qty2' from atm.dbo.OBTN (nolock) group by ItemCode

Text.val: Item Type F = Asset I = Item

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT O.ItemCode, O.ItemName, Isnull(O1.OnHand,0) OnHand, O.InvntItem, O.Counted, isnull(isnull(O1.OnHand,O.OnHand)- isnull(O1.IsCommited,O.IsCommited),0) Available FROM OITM O (nolock) left join oita O1 (nolock) on O1.Itemcode=O.Itemcode and O1.BplId=:3 WHERE O.validFor='Y' AND O.ItemType = 'I' :1 :2

ExpSyntax.val: IF(Trim({1,3})='','',' and (upper(O.ItemCode) like '&ASCIIChr(39)&'%'&Trim(Upper(uSafeSqlStr({1,3})))&'%'&ASCIIChr(39)&' OR upper(O.ItemName) like '&ASCIIChr(39)&'%'&Trim(Upper(uSafeSqlStr({1,3})))&'%'&ASCIIChr(39)&')')

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT O.ItemCode, O.ItemName, Isnull(O1.OnHand,0) OnHand, O.InvntItem, O.Counted, isnull(isnull(O1.OnHand,O.OnHand)- isnull(O1.IsCommited,O.IsCommited),0) Available FROM OITM O (nolock) left join oita O1 (nolock) on O1.Itemcode=O.Itemcode and O1.BplId=:3 WHERE O.validFor='Y' AND O.ItemType = 'I' :1 :2

ExpSyntax.val: IF(Trim({1,3})='','',' and (upper(O.ItemCode) like '&ASCIIChr(39)&'%'&Trim(Upper({1,3}))&'%'&ASCIIChr(39)&' OR upper(O.ItemName) like '&ASCIIChr(39)&'%'&Trim(Upper(RepStr(Trim({1,3}),ASCIIChr(39),ASCIIChr(39)&ASCIIChr(39))))&'%'&ASCIIChr(39)&')')
